sys_template.name: Branch - Duplicate Chargenotes
sys_template.short_description: Duplicate Chargenotes - Same Sales Order Ref and Delivery Number
sys_template.template:
short_description=Duplicate Chargenotes - Same Sales Order Ref and Delivery Number^instructions=Sales order Reference and delivery number:
Date and Time printed on the chargenote:
Date and Time printed on the *duplicate* chargenote:
Where was the sale generated e.g. in branch, call centre, another branch:
Check ATT 042 of BR.CHGNOT/BR.CNHIST (DTM Date and Time Chargenote was print):
Check ATT 047 of BR.CHGNOT/BR.CNHIST (USR Id of user creating sales order):^affected_system=Branch Systems (RPN)^cmdb_ci=SFT-SOE-RPN^close_notes=*** Solution from knowledge document *** Troubleshoot - Duplicate Chargenotes - Same Sales Order and Delivery Number^contact_type=phone^impact=3^category=^subcategory=^close_code=Solved (Work around)
